text: Oliver Proske (born 21 September 1971 in Johannesburg) is a German stage designer, industrial designer, exhibition designer, producer and managing director. In 1998 he founded the Berlin-based independent theatre company Nico and the Navigators together with his partner Nicola Hümpel. == Stage designs == * 1998 Ich war auch schon einmal in Amerika * 1999 Lucky Days, Fremder! * 2000 Eggs on EarthJean-Louis Perrier: Die Berliner von Nico, angesäuerte Navigatoren.
